00028   CdcHit::CdcHit(const CdcHit& right)
00029 : G4VHit()
00030 {
00031   trackID   = right.trackID;
00032   layerNo   = right.layerNo;
00033   cellNo    = right.cellNo;
00034   edep      = right.edep;
00035   pos       = right.pos;
00036   driftD    = right.driftD;
00037   driftT    = right.driftT;
00038   globalT   = right.globalT;
00039   theta     = right.theta;
00040   enterAngle= right.enterAngle;
00041   posFlag   = right.posFlag;  
00042 }
00043

00046 const CdcHit& CdcHit::operator=(const CdcHit& right)
00047 {
00048   trackID   = right.trackID;
00049   layerNo   = right.layerNo;
00050   cellNo    = right.cellNo;
00051   edep      = right.edep;
00052   pos       = right.pos;
00053   driftD    = right.driftD;
00054   driftT    = right.driftT;
00055   globalT   = right.globalT;
00056   theta     = right.theta;
00057   enterAngle= right.enterAngle;
00058   posFlag   = right.posFlag;  
00059   return *this;
00060 }

00064 int CdcHit::operator==(const CdcHit& right) const
00065 {
00066   return (this==&right) ? 1 : 0;
00067 }

00071 void CdcHit::Draw()
00072 {
00073   G4VVisManager* pVVisManager = G4VVisManager::GetConcreteInstance();
00074   if(pVVisManager)
00075   {
00076     G4Circle circle(pos);
00077     circle.SetScreenSize(10.);
00078     circle.SetFillStyle(G4Circle::filled);
00079     G4Colour colour(1.,1.,0.);
00080     G4VisAttributes attribs(colour);
00081     circle.SetVisAttributes(attribs);
00082     pVVisManager->Draw(circle);
00083   }
00084 }
00085 
00086 //....oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo......
00087 
00088 void CdcHit::Print()
00089 {
00090   G4cout << "  trackID: " << trackID 
00091     << "  layerNo: " << layerNo
00092     << "  cellNo:  " << cellNo
00093     << "  energy deposit: " << G4BestUnit(edep,"Energy")
00094     << "  position: " << G4BestUnit(pos,"Length") 
00095     << "  driftD: " << G4BestUnit(driftD,"Length")
00096     << "  driftT: " << G4BestUnit(driftT,"Time")
00097     << "  globalT: " << G4BestUnit(globalT,"Time")
00098     << "  theta: " << G4BestUnit(theta,"Angle")
00099     << "  enterAngle: " << G4BestUnit(enterAngle,"Angle")
00100     << "  posFlag: " << posFlag
00101     <<G4endl;
00102 }
